item.title: Crafting Help
item.dc:creator: @IhvTay IhvTay
item.description:
@IhvTay wrote:

public void cutGem(int item1, int item2) { for (int i = 0; i < GEM_DATA.length; i ++) { if (item1 == 1755 && item2 == GEM_DATA[i][0] || item1 == GEM_DATA[i][0] && item2 == 1755) { c.getItems().addItem(GEM_DATA[i][1], 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(GEM_DATA[i][0], 1);

I’m rewriting crafting, and with the cutGem method I have right there it deletes the uncutgem, and doesnt add the cut gem if you have an inventory of 1 Chisel, and the rest 27 gems.

What would I have to change to fix this? I already tried messing with the item slots and what not :s

I’m obviously new. :palm:

Read full topic
